Hello again!

Is there a way to utilize more than one monitor?

The second would be great for additional info windows about... EVERYTHING

So, for example you could see all these windows, while you have the nice view of your vessel and stuffz

Sooon. I really want this implemented, so we can have a "mission control" screen with lots of info, and one with the craft itself. Stuff can get really cluttered when running mods.

Even without mods, the view with a 3-monitor PC must look awesome, and that's what it's all about.
